juzs.text: Ta [he di er] shuo:“Nandao wo meiyou dui ni shuoguo ni buneng naixin di tong wo zai yiqi ma?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Cihou, jiaru wo zai wen ni renhe shi, ni jiu bubi rang wo peitong nile, ni ye suanshi renzhiyijinle.”

Yushi ta lia you jixu zou. Dang ta lia lai dao yige chengshi de jumin chu shi, ta lia xiang gai cheng de jumin yao shiwu chi, dan tamen bu ken zhaodai [zhu] ta lia. Houlai ta lia zai cheng li faxian yi du qiang kuaiyao daotale, yushi ta [he di er] jiu ba na du qiang fuzheng. Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Jiaru ni yuanyi, ni dique ke wei ci suoqu baochou!”
Ta [he di er] shuo:“Wo he ni gai gaobiele. Wo jiang xiang ni jieshi ni suo buneng rennai di naxie shi.
Guanyu na sou chuan, ta shi shuyu zai haishang laozuo de ji ge pinmin de, wo zhi suoyi yao gao ge quexian sunhuai ta, shi yinwei zai tamen de houmian youyi wei guowang yaoqiang zheng yiqie chuanzhi.
Zhiyu nage nan tong, ta de fumu dou shi xinshi, wo pa ta hui yi panni he buxin qiya ta lia,
suoyi, wo xiwang ta lia de zhu [an la] ling ci ta lia yige geng chunjie, geng xiaojing de erzi.

Zhiyu na du qiang, ta shi shuyu cheng li de liang ge nianqing nan gu'er de, qiang xiamian maizhe ta lia de caibao. Ta lia de fuqin shi yi wei shanren, ni de zhu yu zai ta lia chengnian hou zai rang ta lia quchu ta lia de caibao, zuowei cong ni de zhu jiang shi de yi xiang enhui. Wo meiyou zizuo zhuzhang zuo zhexie shi. Zhe jiushi ni suo buneng rennai de shi de jieshi.”
Tamen wen ni zu lei gao er naiying. Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo jiang xiang nimen xushu youguan ta de yixie qingkuang.”
Wo ceng shi ta zai da dishang huode quanli, bing ci ta chuli wanshi de tujing.
Ta zunxing yitiao tujing.

Dang ta daoda riluo zhi chu shi, ta faxian taiyang zheng luo ru hei ni quan zhi zhong, bing zai fujin faxianle yige minzu. Wo [an la] shuo:“Zu lei gao er naiying a! Ni keyi chengfa tamen, ye keyi shandai tamen.”
Ta shuo:“Shei xing bu yi, wo jiu chengfa shei, ranhou, ta jiang bei dai dao ta de zhu [an la] nali qu, ta [an la] jiang yi yanxing [huo yu] chengfa ta.
Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, ta jiang huode youmei de baochou [leyuan], wo [zu lei gao er naiying] jiang [zaixia mingling shi] dui ta shuo shan yan.”
Ranhou, ta you zunxing yitiao tujing.
Dang ta daoda ri chu zhi chu shi, ta faxian taiyang zheng cong yige minzu de shangmian sheng qi, wo [an la] meiyou ci gei tamen fang ri shai zhi wu.
Shishi jiushi zheyang. Wo dique zhidao ta [zu lei gao er naiying] de yiqie.
Ranhou, ta you zunxing yitiao tujing.
Dang ta daoda liang shan [de shangu] zhi jian shi, ta faxian na li you ge minzu, tamen jihu bu dong [ta de] yuyan.
Tamen shuo:“Zu lei gao er naiying a! Ya zhu zhe he ma zhu zhe [zhu] zhengzai bendi zuo'e. Women xiang ni jingong, qing ni zai women he tamen zhi jian xiujian yidao bilei, hao ma?”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu ciyu wo de [caifu yu quanli deng bi nimen de gong wu] geng hao. Nimen yi laoli xiezhu wo ba! Wo jiang zai nimen he tamen zhi jian xiujian yidao bilei.

Nimen na tie kuai gei wo ba!” Dang ta tian man liang shan zhi jian [de shangu] shi, ta shuo:“Nimen la fengxiang ba!” Dang ta shi tie kuai bian de huohong shi, ta shuo:“Nimen na tong shui gei wo jiaozhu zai shangmian ba!”
Zheyang, tamen [ya zhu zhe he ma zhu zhe] ji buneng pandeng shanglai, ye buneng zao chuan ta.
Ta [zu lei gao er naiying] shuo:“Zhe shi yi wo de zhu de enhui wancheng de. Dang wo de zhu de nuoyan jianglin shi, ta jiang ba zhe dao bilei yi wei pingdi. Wo de zhu de nuoyan shi zhenshi de.”
Zai na ri [ya zhu zhe he ma zhu zhe bei shifang zhi ri], wo jiang rang tamen langtao ban chong chu. Haojiao yi chui xiang, wo jiang ba tamen quanbu jihe qilai.
Zai na ri, wo jiang ba huo yu zhanxian zai bu xinyang zhe mianqian,
tamen de yan jiang bei zhebi, ji buneng kanjian wo de jiaohui [“gulanjing”], ye buneng tingjian.
Nandao bu xinyang zhe renwei, tamen keyi she wo er ba wo de purenmen [ru tianshi, er sa deng] dang zhuzai ma? Wo que yi ba huo yu yubei wei bu xinyang zhe de zhaodai chu.
Ni shuo:“Yao wo gaosu nimen zai hang wei fangmian zui sunshi de ren ma [zhu]?
Tamen jiushi zai jinshi shenghuo zhong tulao wuyi de, er tamen que renwei tamen shi xingshan huo yi de [zhu].
Zhexie ren jiushi fouren tamen de zhu de jixiang he [houshi] yu ta xiang hui de ren. Yinci, tamen de shangong yi tulao. Fuhuo ri, wo jiang bu gei tamen jisuan renhe shangong [zhu].
Zhe jiushi tamen de baochou——huo yu, yinwei tamen bu xinyang bing ba wo de jixiang he shizhemen dang xiaobing.
Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, leyuan jiushi tamen de kuandai chu.
Tamen jiang yong ju qizhong er bu yuan likai.”

Ni [dui renmen] shuo:“Jiaru yi haishui wei mozhi lai jilu wo de zhu de yuyan, name, zai wo de zhu de yuyan shangwei hao jin qian, haishui biding xian yong jin, jishi wo zai jia shang tongyang de yi fen haishui,[ye buneng xie jin wo de zhu de yuyan].”

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo zhishi tong nimen yiyang de fanren, wo suo feng dao de qishi shi: Nimen ying chongbai de zhu zhishi du yi de zhu [an la]. Shei xiwang yu ta de zhu xiang hui, shei jiu gai zuo shangong, zhi neng chongbai ta de zhu [an la], bu gei ta shezhi renhe huoban.”
Kefu, ha, ya, a yin, sa de [alabo yu wu ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
[Zhe shi] xushu ni de zhu dui ta de pu ren zai ke li ya de enhui.
Dangshi, ta di sheng qiqiu ta de zhu [an la].
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de guge shuairuole, wo de tou ye bai fa cangcangle. Wo de zhu a! Zai wo dui ni de qidao zhong, wo cong wei shiwangguo.
Wo si zhihou, wo zhen de danxin wo de qinrenmen hui zou xiedao; wo de qizi ye buneng shengyule, qiu ni ci wo yige jichengren [erzi],
rang ta jicheng [zhu] wo he ya gubu de houyi [zhi jicheng zongjiao zhishi, er bingfei jicheng caifu]. Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi ta chengwei shou ni xiyue de.”
[Zhu de dafu shi]:“Zai ke li ya a! Wo jiang yi yige er zi xiang ni baoxi, ta de mingzi jiao ye ha ya. Yiqian, wo wei gei renhe ren quguo zhege mingzi.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de qizi buneng shengyule, wo ye shuailaole, wo zenme hai hui you erzi ni?”
Ta shuo:“Shishi jiushi zheyang. Ni de zhu shuo:“Zhe dui wo shi rongyi de, wo yiqian chuangzao ni shi, ni ye bu cunzai.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zhaoshi wo yi zhong jixiang ba!” Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni de jixiang shi: Ni lianxu [san tian] san ye butong renmen jianghua, er ni you bu huan bing.”
Ta cong libai dian chulai jian ta de zuren, bing xiang tamen xuangao:“Nimen dang zhaoxi zansong an la.”
[Wo mingling ye ha ya shuo]:“Ye ha ya a! Ni dang jianchi jingdian [“tao la te”].” Wo zai ta tongnian shi yi ci ta zhihui,
Bing shi ta tongqing renmen, zuowei wo jiang shi de ci'ai, qie shi ta chengwei chunjie zhe. Ta shi jingwei de,
shi xiaojing ta de fumu de. Ta bu aoman, ye bu beini [an la huo fumu].
Ta zai chusheng ri, siwang ri he fuhuo ri dou xiangshou zhu ci de ping'an.
Ni [mu sheng] dang zai zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] zhong jiangshu ma'er ya [zhu][de gushi]: Dangshi ta shi ruhe likai ta de jiaren er dao dongbian de yige difang yinju de.
Ta anzhile yige ping zhang, yi bi kai tamen, ranhou, wo pai wo de jingshen [ji bu li lei tianshi] dao ta nali qu, ta zai ta mianqian xianxian cheng yige wanmei de ren.
Ta [dui ta] shuo:“Wo qiu pu ci zhi zhu [an la] baohu wo, mian zao ni de qinhai, jiaru ni shi jingwei [an la] zhe.”
Ta [ji bu li lei tianshi] shuo:“Wo zhishi ni de zhu paiqian de shizhe, wo lai [xiang ni] xuanbu zhujiang ci ni yige chunjie de erzi [de xixun].”
Ta shuo:“Hai meiyou yi wei nanren jiechuguo wo, er wo bingfei bu zhenjie de nuren, wo zenme hui you erzi ni?”
Ta shuo:“Shishi jiushi zheyang. Ni de zhu shuo:“Zhe dui wo [an la] shi rongyi de, wo jiang shi ta chengwei renlei de yi zhong jixiang he cong wo jiang shi de yi zhong enhui. Zhe shi jiding zhishi.”
Yushi ta bian huaile yun [ta], ta huaizhe ta dao yige pianpi di difang [ju yelusaleng yue sizhi liu yingli de boliheng shangu] yinju.
Fenmian de zhentong poshi ta lai dao yi ke ye zao shu xia. Ta shuo:“Yaoshi wo ciqian jiu sile duo hao a! Yaoshi wo bei ren yiwang duo hao a!”
Ci shi, you ge shengyin [ying'er er sa huo ji bu li lei tianshi] cong ye zao shu xia dui ta han dao:“Ni buyao youchou, ni de zhu yi zai ni de xiamian zaole yitiao xiao xi.
Ni chaozhe ziji yaodong ye zao shu, xinxian chengshu de zaozi jiu hui luo zai ni mianqian.
Ni chi ba! Ni he ba! Ni gaoxing ba! Jiaru ni kanjian youren lai, ni jiu shuo:“Wo yi lishi wei pu ci zhi zhu [an la] zhaijie, yinci, wo jintian butong renhe ren jianghua.”
Ranhou, ta baozhe ying'er lai dao ta de zuren nali. Tamen shuo:“Ma'er ya a! Ni dique dai laile yi jian wensuoweiwen de shiqing.
Ha lu [ci ren bushi mu sa di gege ha lun, xi ma'er ya shidai de yi wei qiancheng zhe] de jiemei a! Ni fuqin ji bushi yige dairen, ni muqin ye bingfei bu zhenjie zhe.”
Ta zhizhe nage ying'er. Tamen shuo:“Women zen neng yu yaolan zhong de ying'er jianghua ne [zhu]?”
Ta [nage ying'er] shuo:“Wo que shi an la de puren, ta yi ci wo jingdian, bing rang wo zuo yi wei xianzhi.
Wulun wo zai nali, ta duhui ci fu wo. Ta zhufu wo: Zhiyao wo huozhe jiu dang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke,
xiaojing wo muqin. Ta meiyou shi wo chengwei aoman zhe, buxing zhe.
Wo zai chusheng ri, siwang ri he fuhuo ri dou xiangshou zhu ci de ping'an.”
Zhe jiushi ma'er ya zhizi er sa, shi tamen suo zhenglun de zhenli de chenshu.
An la jue bu hui you ernu [bochi er sa shi an la zhizi de wangyan]. Zanmei ta [an la] chaojue! Dang ta panjue yi jian shiwu shi, ta zhi xu xialing shuo:“You!” Yushi jiu youle.
[Er sa shuo]:“An la que shi wo de zhu he nimen de zhu, suoyi, nimen dang chongbai ta, zhe shi zhengdao.”
Tamen [jidu jiaotu] zhong ge pai [dui er sa de shenshi] yijian fenqi. Fan buxin zhongda zhi ri jijiang lailin zhe, tamen jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Dang tamen lai jian wo di na ri, tamen ting de zhen mingbai! Tamen kan de zhen qingchu! Dan bu yi zhe jintian que shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.
Ni [mu sheng] dang jinggao tamen huihen zhi ri, na shi wanshi yi ding, dan tamen [xianzai] haishi shuhu dayi, haishi bu xinyang [zhu].
Wo bi jiang jicheng dadi ji da dishang de yiqie. Tamen dou jiang gui dao wo zheli lai.
Ni dang zai zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] zhong jiangshu yi bu la xin [de gushi]. Ta que shi yi wei qiancheng zhe, que shi yi wei xianzhi.
Dangshi, ta dui ta de fuqin shuo:“Wo de fuqin a! Ni weisheme yao chongbai naxie ji bu hui ting, ye bu hui kan, dui ni hao wu yichu de dongxi ne?
Wo de fuqin a! Wo que yi shou ci ni suo meiyou huode de zhi shi, suoyi, ni dang gensui wo, wo jiang yindao ni yitiao zhengdao.
Wo de fuqin a! Ni buyao chongbai emo, emo que shi weikang pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de.
Wo de fuqin a! Wo dique haipa ni hui zaoshou cong pu ci zhi zhu [an la] jiang shi de xingfa, yizhi chengwei [huo yu li] emo de pengyou.”
Ta [ta de fuqin] shuo:“Yi bu la xin a! Nandao ni yanwu wo [chongbai] de zhuzai ma? Jiaru ni bu tingzhi, wo biyong shitou da si ni.[Zai wo chengfa ni zhiqian], ni likai wo yuanzougaofei ba!”
Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Qiu zhu ci ni ping'an! Wo jiang qiu wo de zhu kuanshu ni, ta dui wo que shi renci de.
Wo jiang bi kai nimen ji nimen she an la er qiqiu de [ouxiang]. Wo jiang qiqiu wo de zhu, huoxu youyu qiqiu wo de zhu, wo buzhi chengwei buxing zhe.”
Dang ta likai tamen ji tamen she an la er chongbai de [ouxiang] shi, wo ci gei ta yi si ha ge he ya gubu, bing shi ta lia dou chengwei xianzhi.
Wo ci gei tamen wo de enhui [fengfu de jiyang], bing shi tamen xiangyou chonggao de shengyu.
Ni dang zai zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] zhong jiangshu mu sa [de gushi]. Ta que shi bei te xuan de, que shi yi wei shizhe he xianzhi.
Wo cong na zuo shan de youbian zhaohuan ta [mu sa], wo zhao ta lai yu wo mitan.
Wo ci gei ta wo de enhui——ta di gege ha lun——yi wei xianzhi [zuo ta de zhushou].
Ni dang zai zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] zhong jiangshu yi si ma yi. Ta que shi xinshou nuoyan de, que shi yi wei shizhe he xianzhi.
Ta chang zhufu ta de jiaren yao jin shou bai gong he wan na tian ke. Zai ta de zhu [an la] nali, ta shi shou xiyue de.
Ni dang zai zhe bu jingdian zhong jiangshu yi de lisi. Ta que shi yi wei qiancheng zhe, que shi yi wei xianzhi.
Wo yi ba ta tisheng dao yige chonggao di diwei.

Zhexie ren jiushi an la ceng ciyu enhui de xianzhimen. Tamen shuyu a dan de houyi, shuyu wo shi qi yu nu ha yiqi cheng chuan zhe de houyi, shuyu yi bu la xin he yiselie de houyi, shuyu wo suoyindao he xuanze de ren. Dang youren xiang tamen songdu pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de qishi shi, tamen dou baidao koutou he kuqi. Koutou chu
zai tamen zhihou, yige duoluo de houdai jichengle tamen, tamen feiqi bai gong, tantu xiangle [ru xihuan yinjiu, yinluan deng]. Yinci, tamen jiang bei touru huo yu shouxing.
Wei huizui, xinyang bing xingshan zhe liwai [zhu], zhexie ren jiang jinru leyuan, tamen bu shou renhe kuidai.
[Tamen jiang jinru] pu ci zhi zhu [an la] xunuo gei ta de pu renmen de [xianzai hai] kan bujian de yongjiu de leyuan. Ta de nuoyan que shi yao luxing de.
Tamen zai leyuan zhong jiang ting bu dao wang tan, zhi tingjian zhuyuan ping'an; tamen zai leyuan zhong jiang zhaoxi huode [an la ciyu] tamen de jiyang.
Zhe jiushi wo shi wo qianjing de pu renmen jicheng de leyuan.

[Tianshimen jiang shuo]:“Women zhi feng ni [mu sheng] de zhu de mingling jianglin. Fan zai women zhiqian de he zai women zhihou de yiqie, yiji zai qianhou zhi jian de yiqie, dou shi ta [an la] de. Ni de zhu shi jue bu hui wangji de.
[An la shi] tiandi wanwu de zhu, suo yi, ni dang chongbai ta, dang zai chongbai zhong jianren. Ni zhidao you shei neng yu ta xiangtibinglun ma?[Dangran meiyou].”
Ren [bu xinyang zhe] shuo:“Nandao wo si hou hai hui bei fuhuo ma?”
Nandao ren wangjile ma? Wo yiqian chuangzao ta shi, ta ye bu cunzai.
Yi ni de zhu fashi! Wo bi jiang ba tamen he emomen dou jihe qilai, ranhou, wo bi jiang shi tamen gui zai huo yu de zhouwei.
Ranhou, wo bi jiang cong mei pai zhong tichu naxie zui beini pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de ren lai.
Ranhou, wo zui zhidao tamen shei shi zui gai shou huo yu zhi xing de.
Nimen suoyouren dou jiang jinru huo yu [zhu], zhe shi ni de zhu bixu wancheng de yi xiang panjue.
Ranhou, wo jiang zhengjiu jingwei zhe [dui an la jinzhi jinze zhe], jiang rang bu yi zhe gui zai huo yu li.

Dang you ren xiang tamen songdu wo de mingbai de qishi shi, bu xinyang zhe [gu lai shen ren zhongguo shechi shenghuo de duoshenjiao tu] dui xinshi [mu sheng de zhuisui zhe zhongguo jianku shenghuo zhe] shuo:“Liang pai [xinshi yu bu xinyang zhe] zhong na yipai di diwei zuigao, xieshang changmian zui hongda ne?”
Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, nandao naxie ren zai caifu he waiguan fangmian bubi tamen geng youyue ma?

Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Fan zai mi wu zhong zhe, pu ci zhi zhu [an la] jiang [zhanshi] yan kuan tamen de shouming, zhidao tamen kanjian tamen suo bei xunuo de: Bushi xingfa jiushi fuhuo de shijian, na shi tamen jiang zhidao shei di diwei zui elie, shei de liliang zui ruanruo [zhe shi dui di 73 jie jing wen de dafu].”
An la jiang zengjia dui zunxing zhengdao zhe de yindao. Zai ni de zhu kan lai, chijiu de shangong [zhu] cai shi hui ci zui hao de, guisu zui hao de.
Ni kan jian liao bu xinyang wo de jixiang [mu sheng he “gulanjing”] de ren de qingkuang ma? Ta shuo:“[Jiaru wo bei fuhuo], wo bi jiang bei ciyu caifu he ernu.”
Shi ta zhidao wei jian zhi wu ne? Haishi ta huodele pu ci zhi zhu [an la] de yunxu [zhu]?
Bu! Wo jiang jilu tasuo wangyan de, wo jiang zengjia ta [zai huo yu li] de xingfa.
[Ta si hou], wo jiang jicheng tasuo shuo de [ru wo zai jinshi ciyu ta de caifu he ernu], ta jiang duzi lai jian wo.
Tamen she an la er xuan bai xuduo shenling, yibian naxie shenling ci gei tamen rongyu he liliang [bing baohu tamen mian zao an la de xingfa deng].
Bu![Fuhuo ri] naxie shenling jiang fouren tamen dui tamen de chongbai, bing jiang chengwei tamen de choudi.
Nandao ni bu zhidao ma? Wo chang pai emomen qu youhuo buxinyang zhe bing shandong tamen fanzui.
Suoyi, ni buyao dui [chengfa] tamen jizao, wo zhi jisuan tamen [zai jinshi] de shou shu [bing yanhuan tamen dao yige dingqi, yibian tamen zengjia zui'e].
Zai na ri, wo jiang ba jingwei zhe jihe dao pu ci zhi zhu nali jieshou rongyao;
wo jiang [xiang gan gan ke de niu qun qu yinshui yiyang] ba fanzui zhe gan ru huo yu yin feishui jieke,
ci shi renhe ren dou meiyou qiuqing de quanli, wei huode pu ci zhi zhu yunxu zhe liwai.
Tamen shuo:“Pu ci zhi zhu you ernule [zhu][ru wangyan er sa shi an la de erzi, tianshimen shi an la de nu'er deng].”
Nimen dique niezaole yi jian hairentingwen de e shi!
Zhu tian jihu yinci er polie, dadi jihu yinci er benglie, qun shan jihu yinci er bengta.
Zhe shi yinwei tamen wangyan pu ci zhi zhu you ernu.
Pu ci zhi zhu buyi you ernu.
Tiandi jian de yiqie, jianglai meiyou yige bu xiang nupu yiyang lai dao pu ci zhi zhu nali.
Ta que zhi tamen de shumu bing jingmi tongjiguo.
Fuhuo ri, tamen jiang duzi lai jian ta.
Fan xinyang bing xingshan zhe, pu ci zhi zhu bi shi tamen hu jing hu ai [zhu].
Wo yi ni [mu sheng] de yuyan shi zhe bu “gulanjing” chengwei rongyi lijie de, yibian ni jie ci xiang jingwei zhe baoxi, tongshi jinggao qiangbian de minzhong.
Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai,[xianzai] ni neng faxian tamen zhong hai youren [cunzai], huo neng tingjian tamen fachu de wei sheng ma?
Ta ha [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Wo jiang shi ni [mu sheng]“gulanjing”, bushi weile shi ni fannao,
er shi dui jingwei zhe de jiaohui.
Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi cong chuangzao dadi he ge gao tian de zhu jiang shi de.
Pu ci zhi zhu [an la] sheng dao baozuo shang.
Fan zai tiandi jian de yiqie, yiji dixia de yiqie dou shi ta de.
Jiaru ni [mu sheng] gao sheng qiqiu, ta dique shen zhi mimi de he geng yincang de.
An la, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Yiqie zuimei de mingcheng dou shi ta de [zhu].
Ni tingguo mu sa de gushi ma?

Dangshi, ta [mu sa] kanjian yige huoguang. Ta dui ta de jiaren shuo:“Nimen deng yixia, wo que yi kanjian yige huoguang, yexu wo neng cong nali wei nimen qu yige [ranshaozhe de] huoba lai, yexu wo zai huoguang chu neng zhaodao yindao.”
Dang ta daoda huoguang chu shi, you ge shengyin han dao:“Mu sa a!
Wo que shi ni de zhu, ni tuo xia ni de xiezi ba! Yinwei ni que shi zai “tu wa” sheng guzhong.
Wo que yi xuanze ni, yinci, ni dang qingting [wo dui ni de] qishi:
Wo que shi an la, chu wo wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu, suoyi, ni dang chongbai wo, dang wei zan nian wo er jin shou bai gong.
Fuhuo de shijian kending shi yao lailin de, dan wo yao baomi ta, yibian mei ren dou yi ziji suo zuo de nuli er huode baochou [zhu].
Jue buyao rang bu xin fuhuo de shijian er shuncong siyu zhe fang'ai ni [xin fuhuo de shijian], yizhi ni huimie zishen.
Mu sa a! Ni youshou zhong na de shi shenme?”
Ta shuo:“Zhe shi wo de shouzhang, wo zhuzhe ta, wo yong ta daxia shuye lai gei wo de yang qun chi, ta dui wo hai you qita yongtu.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Mu sa a! Ni reng xia ta!”
Yushi ta jiu reng xia na shouzhang, na shouzhang turan bian chengle yitiao hui dong de she.
Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni zhuo zhu ta, ni buyao haipa, wo jiang shi ta huifu yuanzhuang.
Ni ba [you] shou jia zai [zuo] ye xia, ni chouchu shi jiang bian cheng jiebai yaoyan de, bu hui you renhe shanghai, zhe shi ling yi zhong jixiang.
Yibian wo zhaoshi ni wo de [yixie] da jixiang.
Ni dao falao nali qu ba! Ta que shi baonue guofen de.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo de xinxiong kaikuo [qiu ni ci wo zixin, zhizu he wuwei];
qiu ni shi wo de gongzuo shunli;
qiu ni jiechu wo de she jie,
Yibian tamen lijie wo dehua;
qiu ni cong wo de jiaren zhong wei wo renming yi wei zhushou,
[ji renming] wo di gege ha lun;
qiu ni yong ta lai zengqiang wo de liliang;
qiu ni rang ta xiezhu wo de gongzuo,
yibian women chang zansong ni,
yibian women chang zan nian ni [zhu].
Ni dui women que shi quan shi de.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Mu sa a! Ni de qiqiu yingxule.
Wo zai ling yici que yi shi en gei ni.
Dangshi, wo ceng qishi ni muqin ying you de qishi:

“Ni ba ta [haizi] fang zai mu xiang li, ranhou ba mu xiang fang jin [niluohe] he li, heshui [feng'an la zhi ming] hui ba ta piao dao an bian,[zai nali], wo de yige diren——yeshi ta de yige diren hui ba ta shi qu de.” Wo yi ci ni wo de ci'ai, yibian ni zai wo de jianshi xia bei fuyang zhang da.

Dangshi, ni de jiejie zou guoqu shuo:“Yao wo gei nimen jieshao yi wei buyang ta de ren ma?” Yinci, wo you shi ni chong fan ni muqin de huaibao, yibian ta huode anwei, bu zai youchou. Houlai ni shaguo yige ren, dan wo zhengjiu ni tuolile da nan, bing yi yici da monan lai kaoyan ni. Ni ceng zai ma de ya ren nali zhule xuduo nian. Ranhou, mu sa a! Ni yi qian ding er lai [zheli].
Wo wei wo ziji er xuanze ni [zhu].
Ni he ni di gege [ha lun] daizhe wo de jixiang qu ba! Dan ni lia buyao shuhu zan nian wo.
Ni lia dao falao nali qu ba! Ta que shi baonue guofen de.
Ni lia dang dui ta shuo wenhe dehua, yexu ta hui jieshou quangao huo jingwei [an la].”
Ta lia shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women dique pa ta hui [mashang] shanghai women huo gengjia baonue guofen.”
Ta shuo:“Ni lia buyao haipa, wo dique yu ni lia tong zai. Wo shi quan wen de, quan shi de.

Yinci, ni lia dao ta [falao] nali qu bing [dui ta] shuo:“Wo lia que shi ni de zhu [an la] paiqian de shizhe, qing ni rang yiselie de houyi tong women yiqi likai ba! Qing ni buyao nuedai tamen, women que yi gei ni dai laile ni de zhu de jixiang. Qiu zhu ci zunxing zhengdao zhe ping'an!
Women que yi feng dao qishi: Fan fouren [an la ji qi shizhemen] bing beili zhe bi shou xingfa.”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Mu sa a! Ni lia de zhu shi shei?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Women de zhu jiushi fuyu wanwu benxing bing yindao de zhu.”
Ta [falao] shuo:“[Yaoshi zheyang], yiqian ge shidai de qingkuang ruhe ne?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Wei wo de zhu zhidao zhege zhishi, shi jilu zai yi bu tian jing zhong de. Wo de zhu meiyou bu zhidao de, ye bu hui wangji.”
Shi ta wei nimen er ba dadi zao ru chuangpu [yiyang ke yanshen], bing wei nimen zai qizhong kaipi xuduo daolu. Ta cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, jie ci er shengchan chu ge zhong liangxing zhiwu.
Nimen chi ba! Nimen fangmu nimen de shengchu ba! Dui you lizhi de renmen, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Wo cong dadi chuangzaole nimen, wo jiang shi nimen fu fan dadi, zuihou, wo jiang zaici cong dadi quchu nimen [fuhuo].
Wo que yi xiang ta [falao] xianshile wo de suoyou jixiang, dan ta haishi bu xinyang bing jujuele.
Ta [falao] shuo:“Mu sa a! Nandao ni lai women zheli, shi weile yong ni de moshu ba women gan chu women de guotu ma?

[Yaoshi zheyang], women ye yao xiang ni xianshi tongyang de moshu, you ni zai women he ni zhi jian ding yige yue qi, zai yige kaikuo di difang, women zai nali gongping jiaoliang, women he ni dou bu shuangyue.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Nimen [he wo] de yue qi ding zai jieri neitian, taiyang sheng qi hou [ji shangwu], jiao renmen jihe qilai.”
Yushi falao [zhu] jiu likaile. Ta soujile ta de jimou, ranhou you huilaile.
Mu sa dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zhen gaisi! Nimen buyao jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan, yimian ta [an la] yong xingfa huimie nimen. Niezao huangyan zhe bi jiang shibai.”
Tamen wei tamen [bixu zuo] de shiqing huxiang zhenglun, dan tamen baochi mimi xieshang.
Tamen shuo:“Zhe liang ren kending shi moshu shi, ta lia xiang yong ta lia de moshu ba nimen gan chu nimen de guotu, bing feichu nimen de zungui yu xianda.
Suoyi, nimen dang ba nimen de jimou dou souji qilai, ranhou zhengdui er lai. Jintian shei zhan youshi, shei que yi chenggong.”
Tamen shuo:“Mu sa a! Shi ni xian reng [biaoyan]? Haishi women xian reng?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Haishi nimen xian reng ba!” Youyu tamen de moshu [zhu], tamen de shengzi he shouzhang zai ta [mu sa] kan lai haoxiang zai pao dong.
Mu sa de xinzhong gandao kongju.
Wo [an la] shuo:“Ni buyao haipa! Ni kending shi zhan youshi de.

Ni reng chu ni youshou zhong suo na de, ta bi jiang tunmo tamen suo shuanong de [moshu]. Tamen suo shuanong de zhishi moshu shi de xie fa eryi. Moshu shi wulun biaoyan shenme dou shi bu hui chenggong de.”
Yushi moshu shimen zhihao baidao xiaqu. Tamen shuo:“Women xinyang ha lun he mu sa de zhule.”

Ta [falao] shuo:“Zai wo zhunxu nimen zhiqian, nimen gan xiangxin ta [mu sa] ma? Ta yiding shi nimen de shouling, yiding shi ta jiaoshou nimen moshu de. Wo yiding yao jiaocuo kan qu nimen de shoujiao, wo yiding yao ba nimen ding si zai ye zao shugan shang, na shi nimen jiu zhidao women zhong shei de xingfa zui yanli, zui chijiu.”

Tamen shuo:“Women jue bu yuan xuanze ni er fangqi yi jianglin women de mingzheng he chuangzao women de zhu [an la]. Ni xiang zenme panjue jiu zenme panjue ba! Ni zhi neng zai jinshi shenghuo zhong weisuoyuwei.
Women yi xinyang women de zhu, yibian ta kuanshu women de zui'e he ni qiangpo women biaoyan de moshu. An la shi zui hao de [baochou zhe], zui chijiu de [chengfa zhe].”
Shei zuowei zuifan lai jian ta de zhu, shei bi ru huo yu, zai huo yu li busi bu huo.
Shei zuowei xinshi lai jian ta de zhu, qie shi xingshan zhe, name, zhexie ren bi jiang huode zuigao de pinji,
[tamen jiang juzhu zai] yongjiu de leyuan, zhu he cong limian liuguo, yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi dui chunjie zhe de baochou.

Wo que yi qishi mu sa:“Ni shuailing wo de pu renmen zai yejian chuzou ba! Ni dang zai haishang wei tamen kaipi yitiao han dao; ni buyao pa bei [falao ji qi jundui] zhui shang, ye buyao weiju [bei haishui yanmo].”
Falao shuailing ta de jundui zhuigan tamen, dan haishui ba tamen quanbu yanmole.
Falao ba ta de renmin yinru qitu, er wei ba tamen yin shang zhengdao.
Yiselie de houyi a! Wo que yi zhengjiu nimen tuolile nimen de diren, bing zai shan de youbian yuefa nimen, qie jiang gei nimen “man na [zhu][mi yiban tian de jiao zhi wu]” he anchun.
[Bing shuo]:“Nimen chi wo suo ci gei nimen de jiamei shiwu [zhu] ba! Dan nimen buyao guofen, yimian nimen zaoshou wo de qian nu. Shei zaoshou wo de qian nu, shei bi miewang.
Fan huizui, xinyang bing xingshan, ranhou [zhi si] zunxing zhengdao zhe, wo dui ta que shi zui kuanshu de [zhu].
Mu sa a! Ni weihe congmang likai ni de zuren a?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Tamen jin zhui wo de zongji er lai, wo de zhu a! Wo congmang lai jian ni, yi tao ni de xiyue.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Zai ni likai hou, wo que yi kaoyanguo ni de zuren, sa mi li yi shi tamen mi wu.”

Yinci, mu sa huaizhe fennu yu youchou hui dao ta de zuren nali. Ta shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Nandao nimen de zhu meiyou yingxu nimen yige gongping de nuoyan ma? Shi nimen juede [shixian] nuoyan de shijian tai zhangle ne, haishi nimen xiwang zaoshou cong nimen de zhu jiangxia de qian nu, yin'er nimen weibei dui wo de nuoyan ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Women bingfei ziyuan weibei dui ni de nuoyan, er shi women bei po xiedai [falao de] renmin de zhuangshi wu, suoyi, women jiu ba ta reng [jin huo li]le, zhe shi sa mi li jianyi reng de.”

Ta [sa mi li cong huo li quchu zhuangshi wu] wei tamen zhuzaole yige neng fachu niu jiao sheng de niudu ban de quti. Tamen shuo:“Zhe [niudu] shi nimen de zhu, yeshi mu sa de zhu, dan ta [mu sa] wangle [ta de zhu shi shei].”
Nandao tamen bu mingbai na niudu ji buneng huida tamen, ye buneng wei tamen zhangguan huo fu ma?
Ha lun shiqian que yi dui tamen shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Nimen zhishi bei zhe niudu suo mihuo. Nimen de zhu que shi pu ci zhi zhu [an la], suoyi, nimen dang zhuisui wo, dang fucong wo de mingling.”
Dan tamen shuo:“Women jiang jixu chongbai niudu, zhidao mu sa fanhui women zheli.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Ha lun a! Dang ni kanjian tamen wu ru qitu shi, shi shenme fang'ai ni bu zhuisui wo ne? Nandao ni ye yao weikang wo de mingling ma?”
Ta [ha lun] shuo:“Wo muqin de erzi a! Ni buyao zhua zhu wo de huzi, ye buyao zhua zhu wo de toufa. Wo dique pa ni hui shuo:“Ni yi zai yiselie de houyi zhong zhizao fenlie, er bu chong shi wo dehua.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Sa mi li a! Ni zenme la?”

Ta [sa mi li] shuo:“Wo kanjianle tamen suo meiyou kanjian de, wo cong shizhe [ji bu li lei tianshi de ma] de ti ji zhong zhuale yi ba tu, ranhou ba ta sa zai niudu shang. Wo de siyu ruci songyong wo [zheyang zuo].”

Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Ni zou ba! Ni zai jinsheng bi jiang chang shuo:“Buyao peng wo.” Ni que you yige [zao chengfa de] yue qi, ni jue buneng taobi ta. Ni kan yi kan ni qiancheng chongbai de zhuzai ba! Women yiding yao fenhua ta, ranhou ba ta sa zai dahai li.
Nimen ying chongbai de zhu zhishi an la, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu [zhu]. Ta shi zhouzhi wanwu de.”
Wo ruci xiang ni [mu sheng] xushu guoqu suo fasheng de yixie shi, wo que yi ci ni wo zheli de yi xiang jiaohui [“gulanjing”].
Shei bi kai [buxin] ta [“gulanjing”], fuhuo ri [zhu], shei bi fudan zui'e de zhongdan,
yong ju huo yu de xingfa zhong. Fuhuo ri, tamen suo fudan de zhen elie!
Dang haojiao [di er ci] chui xiang zhi ri, zai na ri, wo jiang ba lan yanhei lian de zuifan dou jihe qilai.
Tamen jiang di sheng xiang gao shuo:“Nimen zhi buguo tingliule shi tian.”
Wo zui zhidao tamen yao shuo shenme. Na shi, tamen zhong zui you zhishi he zhihui de ren jiang shuo:“Nimen zhi buguo tingliule yitian.”
Tamen wen ni qun shan de jieju, ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wo de zhujiang chedi fensui qun shan,
bing shi tamen bian cheng yige kongkuang de pingyuan,
ni zai qizhong jiang kan bujian renhe quzhe yu gaodi.”

Zai na ri, renmen jiang zhuisui [an la de] zhaohuan zhe [de shengyin],[na shengyin] hao bu yuhui, suoyou shengyin dou yao wei pu ci zhi zhu [an la] gong jing xialai, chu jiaobu sheng wai, ni zai ye ting bu dao qita shengyin.
Zai na ri, chu pu ci zhi zhu xuke bing xiyue ting qi hua zhe wai, suoyou qiuqing dou shi tulao de.
Ta [an la] zhidao tamen [suoyou bei zaowu] zai jinshi [suo fasheng] de shiqing, ye zhidao tamen zai houshi [jiang fasheng] de shiqing, er tamen que bu zhidao.
[Zai na ri], suoyou mianmu dou jiang xiang yongsheng zili de zhu biaoshi qiangong.[Zai na ri], fan beifu zui'e zhe que yi shibai [zhu];
fan xinyang bing xingshan zhe, ze bupa kuidai he kekou [baochou].
Wo ruci ba ta jiang shi cheng alabo wen de “gulanjing”, bing zai qizhong chanming ge zhong jinggao, yibian tamen jingwei [an la], huo shi tamen jieshou jiaohui.

An la shi zhigaowushang zhe, shi zhuzai he zhenli. Zai “gulanjing” de qishi dui ni [mu sheng] jiang wan qian, ni buyao congmang songdu ta. Ni dang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zengjia wo de zhishi [zhu].”
Yiqian, wo que yi zhufu a dan, dan ta wangjile, wo faxian ta meiyou yili.
Dangshi, wo dui tianshimen shuo:“Nimen dang fucong a dan.” Yushi tamen dou fucongle, wei yi bu lisi liwai, ta jujue fucong.
Wo shuo:“A dan a! Zhe [yi bu lisi] que shi ni de diren, yeshi ni de qizi de diren, suoyi, jue buyao rang ta ba ni lia you chu leyuan, yimian ni lia jianxin tongku [zhu].
Ni zai leyuan li bu hui ji'e, bu hui luolu,
bu hui gan ke, bu hui bei ri shai.”
Dan emo youhuo ta shuo:“A dan a! Yao wo gei ni zhiyin yongsheng shu he buxiu guo ma?”
Yushi ta lia [tou] chile jinguo, ta lia de xiu ti bian hu xiang xianlule, ta lia zhihao yong leyuan li de yezi zheyan ziji de xiu ti. A dan weibeile ta de zhu [de mingling], yin'er wu ru qitu.
Ranhou, ta de zhu xuanze ta, kuanshu ta bing yindao ta.

Ta [an la] shuo:“Ni lia dou cong zheli [leyuan] xiaqu ba! Nimen jiang bici dishi. Jiaru wo de zhengdao jianglin nimen, name, shei zunxing wo de zhengdao, shei jiang bu hui mi wu, ye bu hui jianxin tongku;
shei taobi wo de jiaohui [“gulanjing”], shei biguo beican de shenghuo. Fuhuo ri, wo jiang shi ta zai mangmu zhong bei jihe.”
Ta jiang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo yuan shi neng kanjian de, ni weisheme yao shi wo mangmu di bei jihe ne?”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Shi zheyang de: Wo de qishi jianglin ni shi, ni hushi ta, suoyi, ni jintian ye jiang bei hushi [zai huo yu li, yuanli an la de enhui].”
Fan chaoyue fadu [gan dazui, weikang an la, buxin mu sheng he “gulanjing” deng] qie bu xinyang ta de zhu de jixiang zhe, wo jiu ruci huan bao ta. Houshi de xingfa cai shi zui yanli de, zui chijiu de.

Nandao tamen meiyou huode yindao [huo nandao tamen bu zhidao] ma? Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, tamen chang cong zhexie ren de guju shang zouguo. Dui neng lijie de renmen, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Yao bushi ni de zhu youyanzaixian he qixian yi ding, name, tamen [zai jinshi] biding zaoshou an la de chengfale.

Duiyu tamen suo wangyan de, ni [mu sheng] dang rennai. Ni dang zai ri chu qian [chen li] he riluo qian [bu li] zanmei songyang ni de zhu, dang zai yejian de yibufen shijian [hun li he xiao li] he baizhou zhi duan [shang li] zansong ta [zhu], yibian ni [wei an la jiang ci ni de baochou er] xinxi.

Ni buyao dui wo ciyu tamen zhong ge zhong ren [ge lei bu xinyang zhe] xiangshou de jinshi shenghuo de fuhua yanhong, na shi wo yong lai kaoyan tamen de. Ni de zhu de jiyang cai shi zui hao de, zui chijiu de.

Ni dang zhufu ni de jiaren jin shou bai gong, ni dui bai gong dang chizhiyiheng. Wo bu hui xiang ni suoyao renhe gongji [ru qiancai deng], wo hui ci gei ni. Shan guo [leyuan] shi shuyu qianjing zhe de.

Tamen shuo:“Weisheme ta [mu sheng] bu cong ta de zhu nali dai gei women yi zhong jixiang ne?” Nandao yiqian jingdian zhong jizai de mingzheng [“tao la te” he “yin ji lei” zhong guanyu mu sheng jiang jiang shi de xiaoxi] meiyou jianglin tamen ma?

Jiaru ci [mu sheng he “gulanjing”] qian wo jiu yong xingfa huimie tamen, tamen bi shuo:“Women de zhu a! Yaoshi ni paiqian yi wei shizhe lai yindao women, rang women zai zaoshou beijian he chiru qian jiu zunxing ni de qishi duo hao a!”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Ge zhong ren [ru xinshi yu bu xinyang zhe] dou zai dengdai. Nimen dengdai ba! Nimen bujiu jiang zhidao shei shi zou zhengdao de, shei shi zunxing zhengdao de.”
